EmailTemplate.name: Search Conflict - old2
EmailTemplate.subject: Search Conflict - old2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for using LegalZoom.
We have conducted a preliminary search of the Federal Trademark Register. Please review the attached trademark(s) for potential conflicts and let us know if you wish to continue filing your application.
What is a conflict?
As part of the application process, the examining attorney will search records with the US Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) to see if a conflict exists between the mark in your application and another registered or pending mark. In general, the Trademark Office will reject an application if there is a "likelihood of consumer confusion". To find a conflict, the marks do not have to be identical, and the goods and/or services do not have to be the exactly the same. Some factors include:
? The similarity of the marks in appearance, sound and meaning. ? The relatedness of the goods or service. ? The number of similar marks currently in use. ? The similarity of established sales channels and the sophistication of the buyers.
For more information regarding likelihood of confusion: {!snippetVariable.tm_search_conflict_link}
Next Steps After reviewing these marks, please reply to this e-mail and let me know how you would like to proceed:
1. Process your original Trademark application as is
2. Submit a new name or logo to receive a FREE updated direct-hit search (up to 3 searches are included with your Trademark application order)
3. Consult with an attorney regarding your Trademark (http://attorneyconnect.legalzoom.com)
*** If you would like us to delay the processing of your Trademark Application, please contact us within 15 days of this email.***
Feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Thank you again for choosing LegalZoom.
Best regards,
LegalZoom {!snippetVariable.ipdtm_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
